colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA LA BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO GSAL BAR MDZAD PA'I TSUL LAS @009B BRTZAMS TE BSTOD PA DON DANG LDAN PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BZHUNG BRGYA SMRA BA'I DBANG PHYUG YIL KOG SAN AE RTI NI SHRI RE GE THU RDO RAM PA NGAG DBANG YON TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^BTZUN PA DGON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG KUN DGA'O, ,DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING NAS PAR DU BKOD,, ,,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
